backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor file with an empty actor definition, serving as the backend entry point placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (site sections, visual theme, hero, etc.) to their corresponding source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence descriptions of each frontend source file, summarizing their purpose and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes, including background, foreground, card, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: SEO-optimized HTML entry point with meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter Card tags, JSON-LD LocalBusiness structured data for a Bangalore coaching practice, and Google Fonts imports.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the single-page layout by rendering Navbar, Hero, About, Services, Testimonials, FAQ, Contact, and Footer in a semantic structure.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component displaying the coach's photo, personal narrative, ICF credentials list, and three approach cards with decorative background shapes.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with a validated contact form (name, email, phone, message), a Free Discovery Call CTA linking to Calendly, and location/contact info display.
frontend/src/components/FAQ.tsx: Renders a FAQ section using an accordion component with seven predefined questions and answers about life coaching services, targeting mid-career professionals.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation quick links, social media icons, and a bottom bar with copyright and ICF credential notice.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the full-screen hero section with a background image, headline, subheadline, CTA buttons for booking and learning more, and a social proof stats strip.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Renders a fixed navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a scroll-triggered background change, a desktop CTA button, and a collapsible mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Renders a services section displaying three coaching offerings (1-on-1, group, corporate) as cards with icons, feature lists, and CTA buttons that scroll to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/Testimonials.tsx: Renders a testimonials section with four client quotes, star ratings, and decorative gradient accents, displayed in a responsive two-column grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file kept for future backend query integration; exports nothing currently.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global CSS custom properties for the brand palette (saffron, cream, charcoal, gradients), Tailwind base/component/utility layers, and reusable component classes like btn-saffron and section-heading.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with brand colors (saffron, cream, charcoal, indigo), custom fonts (Playfair Display, Lato), box shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes, plus typography and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state metadata including version, architectural notes, image requirements, and a list of implemented features for a life coaching single-page website targeting Bangalore professionals.
